articles.title: The fall trip to the pharmacy for a Covid shot may be strewn with obstacles - Politico
articles.description: Millions of Americans who live in certain states may not be able to get vaccinated at a local pharmacy.

articles.title: DNA from extinct hominin may have helped ancient peoples survive in the Americas - Phys.org
articles.description: Thousands of years ago, ancient humans undertook a treacherous journey, crossing hundreds of miles of ice over the Bering Strait to the unknown world of the Americas.
articles.content:
